thread.title: Elizabeth Sherman
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Elizabeth Sherman

author: Elizabeth Sherman
title: Elizabeth Sherman
text: I was researching and looking into doing the BBG. Then I found the discount website and saw I could get both workout guides and the help (nutrition) guide for a fraction of the original cost. I thought it had to be a scam getting it for such a discounted rate - completely legit!!! I didn't hesitate to make my purchase then. Once I made my payment I immediately received all 3 guides - I couldn't believe it was so easy! Now I'm prepped and ready to join the BBG community and am thrilled to see what results I get! I would definitely recommend using the discount site!
